mapper.select: SELECT LEVEL , R.REPLY_ID , R.BOARD_ID , R.ARTICLE_ID , R.EMAIL R_EMAIL , R.CONTENT , R.REG_DATE , R.PARENT_ID , M.EMAIL M_EMAIL , M.NAME , M.POINT FROM REPLY R , MEMBERS M WHERE R.EMAIL = M.EMAIL AND R.BOARD_ID = #{boardId} AND R.ARTICLE_ID = #{articleId} START WITH R.PARENT_ID = '0' CONNECT BY PRIOR R.REPLY_ID = R.PARENT_ID
